medical_history.chief_complaint: Mild shortness of breath while walking up an incline.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 2 months ago and have been inconsistent. The patient can walk on level surfaces and perform normal daily activities without difficulty. No progression of symptoms reported.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of hypertension, aortic stenosis, recurrent skin cancers, restless leg syndrome, chronic constipation, and hyperlipidemia.
medical_history.social_history: Lives with wife, has 2 grown children, consumes 1 to 2 glasses of wine per week, no history of cigarette smoking.
